column4: Hello, i'm getting this error with Xchat "Cannot find 'notify-send' to open balloon alerts. Please install libnotify" I checked my packages, and I do have this installed. Can anyone help me out with this?
I have the same issue.. not sure what causes it but it doesn't seem to effect anything.
yeah I know, just that pop up error is annoying. Was thinking about trying Kopete if its compatible gnome. Just don't know how good it is.
